message: I step inside. Everything looks so expensive, I half expect them to throw me out on my ass.
The shop is massive and totally spotless.
Allmates are lined up in glass cases alongside clothes and toys and other accessories.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Ren. Look at that."
Ren pops his head out of my bag.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I bet these Allmates have better lives than some of the people back home."

name: 蓮
message: "I can't deny that possibility."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Right?"
There are other customers in the shop. They walk around peering into the cases, almost as if admiring fine art.
I spot the section for tools and parts and head over. There aren't very many options.
The latest Allmates can be serviced remotely through a Coil, so I guess there isn't much demand.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hmm. None of these'll work..."
I consider asking for help, but all the clerks look busy.
As I look around, trying to figure out what to do, a digital poster catches my eye.
"Special Celebration Coming Soon!"
A date is flashing below it. This Celebration will run for two days, starting tomorrow. The poster doesn't describe what it is, though.
Curious, I turn to a customer standing next to me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh, excuse me."

name: 女性客Ｂ
message: "Yes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "So, this Celebration thing. Do you know anything about it?"

name: 女性客Ｂ
message: "They haven't said yet. Seems they wanna keep it a surprise."

name: 女性客Ｂ
message: "But I'm sure it's going to be absolutely fabulous. Even the regular parades here are a treat!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay..."

name: 女性客Ｂ
message: "Mr. Toue has to show up, right? He's sooo amazing!"

name: 女性客Ｂ
message: "Everything he does is just so perfect and elegant... He's such a dreamboat!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks."
I bow and step away.
I guess even the regulars don't know what the Celebration's about.
She did say Toue might show up... Maybe I could get close to him there?
It's my best lead. I'll just have to make it work.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, let's check out the event tomorrow."
But Ren doesn't reply.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren?"
Looking at my bag, I see Ren staring intently at one of the Allmates in its case.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong?"
There's a screen inside that lists the Allmate's specs. I gasp when I see what it says.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wow... That's something."
I've never been that interested in Allmates, to be honest, but the newer models are definitely impressive.
My custom unit can't even compare to the default specs of these new models.
They're useful in day-to-day life too, not just in Rhyme. And they don't require analog maintenance.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wow... I can't believe they've gotten this advanced."

name: 蓮
message: "Are you interested?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shouldn't I be asking you that? You've been staring at it this whole time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, it is pretty cool. I bet it's useful."

name: 蓮
message: "...Do you want to try it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"
I look at Ren, surprised by the question, but he's still focused on the case.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Of course not. I have you."

name: 蓮
message: "You're only saying that because you've never had a newer model."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? What're you talking about?"
Ren's being weird again.
Suddenly, he wriggles out of my bag and runs off.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey!"
But he's already out the door.
What the hell is he thinking?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
